name: Laura Barbosa
headline: Product-Minded Builder. Shaping the Next Generation of Software.
outcomes: Reduce busywork with clear, dependable workflows
Ship MVPs that feel considered, not rushed
Turn fuzzy problems into testable decisions
enjoyBuilding: Internal tools that quietly save time
Small experiments with big learning value
craftProcess: Name the real decision and its boundaries
Prototype the smallest thing that teaches us
Check it against real usage signals
Ship, learn, and make the next pass kinder
currentlyExploring: AI and agentic workflows (with guardrails and taste)
